content: I'm feeling a bit guilty about it, to be honest. I know I shouldn't have spent that much money on a handbag, especially since I've been trying to cut back on unnecessary expenses. But at the time, I just couldn't resist the temptation. Now that I'm thinking more critically about my spending habits, I realize that I need to be more mindful of my motivations and priorities. I'm hoping that by using the combination of digital tools and the envelope system, I'll be able to make more intentional purchasing decisions and avoid impulsive buys like that in the future.
